articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Transgender swimmer Lia Thomas reveals her Olympic dream as US trials for Paris draw closer - ABC News
articles.description: American swimmer Lia Thomas says she has her eyes on Paris 2024, as she takes aim at critics of transgender athletes.
articles.content:
Transgender swimmer Lia Thomas said she intends to keep competing, with the ultimate goal of reaching the Olympics.
